entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:59 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
